hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT search_parameters.id FROM search_parameters LEFT JOIN search_and_validation_settings ON search_and_validation_settings.l_search_parameters_id = search_parameters.id AND search_and_validation_settings.id NOT IN ( SELECT s_and_v_s.id FROM search_and_validation_settings s_and_v_s WHERE s_and_v_s.l_analytical_run_id IN (:ids) ) WHERE search_and_validation_settings.l_search_parameters_id IS NULL
